metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30608 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Chromium: CVE-2021-30608 Use after free in Web Share

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30608` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 93.0.4577.63-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 93.0.4577.63-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 93.0.4577.63-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 93.0.4577.63-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 93.0.4577.63-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '93.0.4577.63-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
